name: Mike Breeding
text: I was sorely disappointed in the birthday party we scheduled. The party was scheduled 1:00-3:00. We showed up around 12:50 assuming it was going to take 10-15 minutes to get all 6 kids setup and ready to play. Unfortunately that wasn’t the case. The kids didn’t get setup and playing until around 1:40 (leaving only an hour to play).  At 2:40 the kids we sent into the party room to eat pizza and open presents.  At 2:50 the guy came in to inform us that we had to be out of there within 10 minutes.  Keep in mind that we paid for 2 hours of playing for the kids and it took 45+ minutes before they all could start playing. The guy that was working informed us that it normally isn’t this troublesome and he wasn’t sure what was wrong  ( we even had a PC crash in the middle of a game within 5 minutes after we finally got it up and running). I will say the only positive to the experience was how nice the staff was but for $275 I expected to at least get an hour and 40 minutes of playing time before eating and we only received maybe an hours worth.  Not worth the money that was spent.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear this. If it is okay we would like to contact you and offer 1 hour of free gaming for each child who attended.This is not our standard for our parties and we are so sorry. We do hope you give us another chance to redeem our store. We hope to speak to you soon.

name: Mckinney Chattman
text: Glad you guys are here.. It's been a fun time the two times I've been there.  🙌🏾💯💙 Virtual Reality with the Zombies is my favorite

resp.text: Thank you for visiting! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Katie Farley
text: Great games for people of all ages and interests! Staff was super friendly as well. I liked the rollercoaster simulator the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful time. We hope you come back and play again!

name: Marisa Hamilton
text: Best Surprise Birthday Party! The staff was excellent!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback. We are so happy to hear you had a five star experience! We hope your party was everything and more! Thank you again for supporting a small business

name: Josh Serena
text: Great Venue! I came here with my girlfriend and it makes a great date night or a cool family night out. The staff is super fun and helpful. The restaurant is also super good. It's not just cheap arcade food, it's super fresh and made right in front of you! Highly recommend whether you're into video games or not! They really have something for everyone; 6 Solo Virtual Reality Booths, 2 Multiplayer Virtual Reality Booths, a ton PCs, 7 XboxOnes, 7 PS4s, and 2 Custom Virtual Reality Racecars!! The restaurant has custom made pizzas, subs, salads, wings, soft drinks, 20 beers on tap, and a few wines too!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! So glad you both had a wonderful time!

name: Malik Sealey
text:
Great place to chill, good staff. But it does not have Blade and Sorcery.

#hateschool123

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We will look into adding your recommendation!

name: Derrick cain
text: I was blown away. I am not a gamer but my kids love to play and I actually got to spend quality time with my children playing VR and console games. The staff was tremendously helpful making me feel like I was part of the gaming community. I enjoyed it so much we booked a birthday party and all 10 kids that came could not believe how fun it was to have an arena for them to compete in. They felt like professional gamers. I could play the VR games all day. They have cold beer on tap and a restaurant with food that was really good and not crazy expensive. We are making this a monthly family fun day.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. We appreciate the positive feedback. Thank you for your review and hope to see you again soon!

name: Mallory Shaw
text: Very satisfied with our experience at the ePLEX! Clean, friendly staff, and very accessible for person’s with disabilities. Will definitely be going back!

resp.text: Great to hear! We certainly value the feedback. Thank you for supporting a small business during this time. Hope to see you all soon.

name: Erin Lovett
text: If you haven't been you have to go. I knew my son would love it but I ended up loving it too! Super friendly and knowledgeable staff

resp.text: Thank you so much for visiting us today! Our staff loves to help and we are so glad you ended up loving it too! Come back and Game On with us anytime!

name: Johnny Karris
text: A great place to play games online with your friends or to throw a party great prices

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your experience. Thank you so much for your review.

name: California21
text:
Its a MUST GO TO for gamers of all ages!!
All of the staff were so nice ,attentive, respectful and kind. Two thumbs up for excellent customer service!
They have so many gaming options available at your finger tips you can easily spend hours there and enjoy every minute.  The VR head sets are a definite fav. Eplex is a good clean environment and a wonderful place to go hang out, relax and game hard, its easily 5 stars. I can't wait to go back.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed the ePLEX! We prioritize our cleanliness and customer service! Thank you for this wonderful review! Come back and Game On with us anytime!!

name: Jennifer Cook
text: I took my six year old because he said his dream was to be in a video game. We did the VR experience and it was amazing! I’m not a gamer and I had a blast. I also earned cool mama points!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your Virtual Reality experience! Game On!

name: Kelsey Luckianow
text: This is one of the best additions to Birmingham. We went recently for our friend's 31st birthday party (yes, I said 31st). It was awesome. We had the Matrix package for the Virtual Reality pods. There were 10 of us, and we all had PLENTY of game time for 2 hours. We also had wonderful service for our party. Eve and Ian were great! I'd say if you're looking for a fun time out with friends or family, this is definitely a place to go. We will be back for sure!

resp.text: Great to hear! We certainly value the feedback. Hope to see you all soon.

name: Brenda Jones
text:
My grandson had his Birthday  party here and is is a great  place for  birthday parties!  The  staff  here are amazingly  friendly and welcoming and helpful!   The bathrooms are  so clean!!!  That's one of my pet peas ( clean  restrooms).

Eva Seidel  she greeted  us with a  big smile and  she is so  amazing!!  I will come back just because she was so incredibly nice to us!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We hope he had a wonderful birthday!

name: Randy Rich
text: This place is phenomenal. Everything we played was great. Very helpful staff for us ole timers!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for your review and hope to see you again soon!

name: Jesse Stewart
text: Awesome location. There is plenty of space for events and their hardware is great. This is the best esports location in Birmingham.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review we do appreciate it!

name: Noah Holmes
text: Simply amazing. Loved how good the food was, amazing tournament experience. Kind people and great staff!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience. See you again soon!

name: Ainsley Cohn
text:
Eplex is really a fun time for the whole family. We visited all the way from Baton Rouge (6 hrs away) because there is nothing like it around us. The virtual reality experiences were not only amazing to experience yourself but also fun to watch each other experience. We drove virtual cars, walked virtual planks, fought virtual zombies and so much more. And, of course, if anyone in the family is a gamer....that side of the building is a paradise for them. Not to mention the food was great, and there is even a bar for adults!!
This would be a great place to have birthday parties, a group of friends, or even a fun experience with co-workers too!

resp.text: We are so glad you had a wonderful time! Thank you for leaving us a positive review!

name: Segun Ajigbeda
text: Cool place but got to make sure you're a gamer in order to get your money's worth.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting come again soon!

text: Went to see a UNA basketball game. Nice auditorium, social distancing was being practiced. Only bad thing was that the snack bars are closed.

name: Mickey Berry
text: We’ve attended several events here, including several graduations. It’s really impossible to sit in the seats were a long period of time, because it is so hard and uncomfortable. Otherwise, the staff and the facility were fine. We watched my sister get her NBA diploma. I like the size of the personality and the ease with which you can get in and out of the place.
